en.answer:
Yes, you can. When that activation resolves, any Fusion Materials that would be sent to the Graveyard are banished instead, but the Fusion Summon will be performed normally.

~~~
This also applies to performing Fusion Summons using any of the following:
● Monster effects: of Ancient Gear Hunting Hound, D/D Swirl Slime, Performapal Trump Girl, Performapal Splashmammoth, Performapal U Go Golem, Performapal Odd-Eyes Dissolver, or Curse of Dragonfire.
● Pendulum Effects: of Performapal Trump Witch or Performapal Odd-Eyes Dissolver.
● Spell Effects: of Shaddoll Fusion, Branded Fusion, Red-Eyes Fusion, Ancient Gear Fusion, Spiral Fusion, Fullmetalfoes Fusion, Lunalight Fusion, Ostinato, Power Bond, Dark Fusion, Fusion Destiny, Odd-Eyes Fusion, Pendulum Fusion, Predaprime Fusion, Cynet Fusion, Fusion of Fire, Ghost Fusion, El Shaddoll Fusion, Nephe Shaddoll Fusion, Fusion Substitute, Chimera Fusion, Metalfoes Fusion, Gem-Knight Fusion, Brilliant Fusion, Witchcrafter Confusion Confession, Trickstar Fusion, Mementotlan Fusion, or The Terminus of the Burning Abyss.
● Trap Effects: of Dinomorphia Domain or Dinomorphia Frenzy.
en.question: While an effect such as those of Macro Cosmos or Dimension Shifter is applying, causing any cards that would be sent to the Graveyard to be banished instead, can I activate Polymerization and perform a Fusion Summon?
en.title: Can I activate Polymerization and perform a Fusion Summon while Macro Cosmos' effect is applying?

ja.question: 「<<6682>>」や「<<14740>>」などの『墓地へ送られるカードは墓地へは行かず除外される』効果が適用されている状況で、「<<4837>>」を発動し、融合召喚することはできますか？
ja.title: 『墓地へ送られるカードは墓地へは行かず除外される』状況で、融合召喚を行うことはできますか？
